title: Blake Shelton Talks About Life After Miranda Lambert Split
text:
> Entertainment Blake Shelton Talks About Life After Miranda Lambert Split Blake Shelton says he's "in a good place" following his split from Miranda Lambert.The 39-year-old country star and The Voice coach talked about his life post-breakup in an interview on CMT Hot 20 Cou The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
